SELECT a.customer_name,a.customer_code,a.profession_id,a.customer_tel,a.customer_birth,a.profession_id,DATE_FORMAT(a.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as add_time, DATE_FORMAT(a.update_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as update_time,b.add_name FROM per_customerinfo a LEFT JOIN (SELECT customer_tel,add_name from per_robcustomer where Status=0 ) b ON a.customer_tel = b.customer_tel
and (a.customer_name like concat('%', #{customerName}, '%') or a.customer_tel = #{customerName})
limit 0,10

SELECT d.corp_name, c.project_name, DATE_FORMAT( b.trackingtime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as trackingtime FROM mar_company d LEFT JOIN mar_demand c ON d.corp_code = c.corp_code LEFT JOIN mar_demandresume a on a.demand_id = c.demand_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT demandresume_id ,trackingtime FROM mar_demandresumefollow WHERE follow_status = 7 ) b ON a.id = b.demandresume_id where a.customer_code=#{customerCode}
SELECT b.customer_code, a.customer_name, a.customer_tel FROM per_robcustomer a LEFT JOIN per_customerinfo b ON a.customer_tel=b.customer_tel where a.Status=0 and a.add_people=#{username}

SELECT a.resume_id as customerCode , a.customer_name as customerName, a.customer_tel as customerTel, DATE_FORMAT( a.edit_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as editTime, DATE_FORMAT( a.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as addTime, b.memo_detail as memoDetail, DATE_FORMAT(b.contact_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as contactTime
FROM per_robcustomer a LEFT JOIN (SELECT f.memo_detail,d.contact_customercode,d.contact_time from (SELECT contact_customercode , max(contact_time) as contact_time from per_cuscontact GROUP BY contact_customercode) d LEFT JOIN per_cuscontact f on d.contact_customercode=f.contact_customercode and d.contact_time=f.contact_time )b on a.resume_id=b.contact_customercode where a.Status=0 and a.add_people=#{opertCode} and a.customer_name = #{customerName} and a.customer_tel = #{customerTel} order by a.edit_time desc

SELECT a.customer_code as customerCode,a.customer_name as customerName,a.customer_tel as customerTel, DATE_FORMAT(a.customer_birth,'%Y-%m-%d') as customerBirth ,a.profession_id as professionId, a.work_year as workYear,a.education,a.customer_university as customerUniversity, a.expectation_salary as expectationSalary,a.intention_area as intentionArea, DATE_FORMAT(a.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as addTime,a.resume_path as resumePath,b.add_name as addName FROM per_customerinfo a LEFT JOIN per_robcustomer b on a.customer_tel=b.customer_tel and b.Status=0 where b.add_name is null and a.profession_id = #{professionId} and a.work_year = #{workYear} and a.education = #{education} and a.intention_area = #{intentionArea} ORDER BY addTime desc
SELECT COUNT(opert_code)as sad from per_customerinfo WHERE DATE_FORMAT(add_time, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) , '%Y%m' ) GROUP BY opert_code ORDER BY sad desc LIMIT 1
